name: Apple iPhone XS Max
details: Woot is offering the New Condition Apple iPhone XS Max 512GB 6.5" OLED Unlocked Smartphone w/ A12 Bionic Chip, IP68 Dust & Water Resistance, 1 Year Apple Warranty for a low $849.99. Free Shipping for Amazon Prime Members or $6 Shipping. In comparison, Apple sells the refurbished Model for $1099, you're getting this brand new with the same warranty.

name: OnePlus 8 128GB
details: Amazon now carries the OnePlus 8 6.55" 2400x1080 AMOLED 90Hz 128GB Smartphone starting from $699.00 Free Shipping. The 256GB OnePlus 8 is only $100 more.

name: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip Smartphone
details: Samsung just announced their newest Samsung Galaxy Z Flip Smartphone starting from $1380.00 Free Shipping. If you plan on picking it up on same day at Sprint, we recommend you order online and choose store pick-up option where available since supplies are limited.

name: Apple Refurbished: iPhone 8, X, XS models
details: Apple is offering Refurbished iPhone 8. X, XS Unlocked Smartphones w/ 1 year Apple Warranty starting from $469.00 Free Shipping. Stock is very limited and can fluctuate. Some examples:
